summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2019 NISSAN ROGUE SPORT. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS EQUIPPED WITH A REAR CROSS TRACK SYSTEM DESIGNED TO DETECT OBJECTS CLOSE TO THE REAR OF THE VEHICLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FEATURE FAILED TO OPERATE AS DESIGNED. THE CONTACT TOOK THE VEHICLE TO NISSAN OF STATEN ISLAND (1976 HYLAN BLVD, STATEN ISLAND, NY 10306; (718) 447-3800) AND WAS INFORMED THAT THE SOFTWARE NEEDED TO BE UPDATED. THE SOFTWARE WAS UPDATED HOWEVER, THE FAILURE PERSISTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND INFORMED OF THE FAILURE. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE VEHICLE OPERATED AS DESIGNED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 28,000.*DT*JB
